column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " I 've checked all the shops on this pier .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Quite the contrary .
#Text=I always say , the only thing better than finding something you are looking for is finding something you were n't looking for at a great bargain !
#Text=" Zuko says : " You bought a tsungi horn ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " For music night on the ship .
#Text=Now , if we only had some woodwinds .
#Text=Oh , this place looks promising !
#Text=Oh , that is handsome !
#Text=Would n't it look magnificent in the galley ?
#Text=" Oh says : " We lost the Water Tribe girl and the little bald monk she was traveling with .
#Text=" Zuko says : " This monk , did he have an arrow on his head ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I just want to try this one move first and then it 's all yours .
#Text=Here , hold it open for me .
#Text=The single water whip .
#Text=Looks doable .
#Text=Ow !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ha , ha , ha !
#Text=" Katara says : " What 's so funny ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm sorry , but you deserved that .
#Text=You 've been duped ; she 's only interested in teaching herself .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang will get his turn once I figure out the water whip .
#Text=Ugh , why ca n't I get this stupid move ?
#Text=" Aang says : " You 'll get it .
#Text=You just got ta shift your weight through the stances .
#Text=There , see , the key to bending is — " Katara says : " Will you please shut your air hole ?
#Text=Believe it or not your infinite wisdom gets a little old sometimes !
#Text=Why do n't we just throw the scroll away since you 're so naturally gifted !
#Text=What ?
#Text=Oh my gosh , Aang , I am so sorry , I do n't know what came over me .
#Text=But you know what , it wo n't happen again .
#Text=Here , this is yours .
#Text=I do n't want to have anything to do with it anymore .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's okay Katara .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What about Momo ?
#Text=He 's the real victim here .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sorry , Momo .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And what about me ?
#Text=There was that time you — " Katara says : " No more apologies !
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " Should n't we stop to search the woods ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " We do n't need to stop .
#Text=They stole a waterbending scroll , right ?
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " Mm-hm .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Then they 'll be on the water .
#Text="
